"IF PERSONS BEFORE EMBRACING THE MESSAGE HAVE ENTANGLED THEMSELVES, AND AFTERWARD HAVE REPENTED, CONFESSED THEIR SINS, RECEIVED FORGIVENESS OF GOD, AND WON THE CONFIDENCE OF THEIR BRETHREN, IT IS BETTER FOR BOTH MINISTERS AND LAYMEN TO LEAVE THEM ALONE, ENJOYING THE FORGIVENESS AND JUSTIFICATION WHICH HAVE BEEN 
                                                                           221
WROUGHT THROUGH CHRIST, WITHOUT UNDERTAKING TO TEAR UP EXISTING RELATIONS."--FEBRUARY 21, 1927.
